value.verse: Give the King your justice, O God, *
value.halfverse: and your righteousness to the Kingâ€™s son;

value.verse: That he may rule your people righteously *

value.halfverse: and the little hills bring righteousness.
value.verse: That the mountains may bring prosperity to the people, *

value.halfverse: he shall rescue the poor and crush the oppressor.
value.verse: He shall defend the needy among the people; *
He shall live as long as the sun and moon endure, *

value.halfverse: like showers that water the earth.
value.verse: He shall come down like rain upon the mown field, *
In his time shall the righteous flourish; *
value.halfverse: there shall be abundance of peace till the moon shall be no more.

value.verse: He shall rule from sea to sea, *
value.halfverse: and from the River to the ends of the earth.

value.verse: His foes shall bow down before him, *
value.halfverse: and his enemies lick the dust.

value.verse: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall pay tribute, *
value.halfverse: and the kings of Arabia and Saba offer gifts.
and all the nations do him service.
value.verse: All kings shall bow down before him, *
For he shall deliver the poor who cries out in distress, *
value.halfverse: and the oppressed who has no helper.

value.verse: He shall have pity on the lowly and poor; *
value.halfverse: he shall preserve the lives of the needy.

value.verse: He shall redeem their lives from oppression and violence, *
value.halfverse: and dear shall their blood be in his sight.

may prayer be made for him always,
 and may they bless him all the day long.
value.verse:
Long may he live!
and may there be given to him gold from Arabia; *

May there be abundance of grain on the earth,
growing thick even on the hilltops; *
value.halfverse:
may its fruit flourish like Lebanon,
 and its grain like grass upon the earth.

value.verse:
May his Name remain for ever
and be established as long as the sun endures; *
value.halfverse: may all the nations bless themselves in him and call him blessed.

value.verse: Blessed be the Lord GOD, the God of Israel, *
And blessed be his glorious Name for ever! *
value.halfverse: and may all the earth be filled with his glory. Amen. Amen.
